text: الى الله مرجعكم وهو على كل شىء قدير

translations.translation: You will return to Allah. He has power over all things.'
To God have you to go back, and He has power over everything.
Unto Allah is your return, and He has power to do everything.
To God you will all return. God has power over all things."
“To Allah only you have to return, and He is Able to do all things.”
To Allah is your return, and He is able to do all things."
To Allah is your return, and He has power over all things.
to God shall you return; He is powerful over everything.'
Unto Allah is your return, and He is Able to do all things.
to God you shall all return; and He has power over all things.
Unto Allah is your return, and He is over everything Potent.
To Allah will be your return, and He has power over all things.’
To Allah is your return, and He hath power over all things.'"
To Allah is your return, and He is Able to do all things."
To Allah you shall all return. He has power over all things.
“To God is your return, and He is Capable of all things.”
To Allah is your return, and He is over all things competent."
[11:4] Unto God is your return, and He has power over all things’, including reward and chastisement.
(Unto Allah is your return) after death, (and He is able to do all things) whether it is reward or punishment.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
واعلموا أيها الأظلال المقهورة { إِلَى ٱللَّهِ } الواحد الأحد الصمد
 المتجلي في الآفاق بالاستقلال والاستحقاق { مَرْجِعُكُمْ } ورجوعكم رجوع الظل إلى ذي الظل والعكوس إلى ما انعكس منها { وَهُوَ } سبحانه في ذاته قاهر فوق عباده { عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ } من صور العذاب والانتقام { قَدِيرٌ } [هود: 4] لا يخرج عن حيطة قدرته شيء
 ولا يعزب عن علمه معلوم
 مما جرى عليهم من الأحوال

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
أو يوم بدر { إلى الله مرجِعُكم } أي: رجوعكم في ذلك اليوم الكبير
 أو بالموت
 { وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ } فيقدر على بعثهم وعذابهم أشد العذاب
 وكأنه تقرير لكبر اليوم
